subject: Throttle pedal no input
description_text:
﻿Hi,

Got my Pro X Ultra pedals in June a couple days back my throttle pedal
isn’t getting any input neither in game nor in the Simsonn manager app.
After inspection and removing the hydraulic damper noticed the spring had
just fallen, but there is nothing really that it can hold on to… as if it’s
missing a piece.
Tried to reposition the spring in between the screws from the pedal and
load cell respectively. This resulted in the Simsonn app receiving input
from the throttle pedal but not in a normal way.
Now I have to depress the pedal about 40% before it shows a any input, the
reading is unstable even after calibration which I tried a few times.
I’m hoping we can resolve this issue soon since I just got my Simsonn
haptic reactors and I really wanted to install them and use.
Herby I attached my purchase invoice and a few photos of the issue.
Let me know if you require something else
[image: image5.jpeg]
[image: image3.jpeg][image: image4.jpeg][image: image1.jpeg][image:
image2.jpeg]
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Julia Menache,     I can see that the non-metal pressure plate of the throttle spring was broken because the travel was too short and it was pressed by the blue limiter. We will ship the replacement parts to you on Monday, and you can replace the component once you receive them.

That's great, thank you very much!

On Fri, Dec 5, 2025 at 11:51 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Julia Menache,  The tracking number is: YT2534300706921306, the shipping carrier is YunExpress, you can track it via https://www.yunexpress.com/.
